question.title: Android Drawable Importer Broken (Again) in Android Studio Meerkat 2024.3.1
question.body:
Well, it's that time again that IntelliJ released a new version of Android Studio and broke our plugins. Now, with the new Android Studio, although the plugin is enabled but you won't able to see it in your Tools or Right Click Menu.

I am using MPArnold and Skeaner's forked fixes here.

Since the accessibility of ChatGPT and Claude AI, I thought I can take a swing at fixing it. I've actually managed update the dependencies and made the project runnable, even able to launch a project and I tried exporting it into Android Studio Meerkat.

But, the problem persist and I didn't realised how frustrating it can be working on IntelliJ plugins. No useful logs and virtually no documentations.

I've consolidated MPArnold's and Skeaner's solutions in this forked feature/meerkat-fix branch I have.

Could someone help to look into it? Android Drawable Importer plugin has been incredibly useful to my workflow and I wish to maintain it however I can.

Thanks!
